Crapula.text: Examination will take place on the ---

Crepitus.text: Expect to be with you this evening

Cribrum.text: Expect to be with you to-morrow

Crispus.text: Expect to be with you in a few days

Croceus.text: Expect to be with you in time for ---

Crocota.text: Am daily expecting to receive information

Crudesco.text: Have been expecting letter from my husband. Telegraph how he is

Crudus.text: Have been expecting letter from my wife. Telegraph how she is

Crumena.text: Have been expecting letter. Telegraph health of ---

Crusta.text: Have been expecting letter. Telegraph how you are getting on

Crux.text: Have been expecting letter. Telegraph news

Crypta.text: Have been expecting to hear from you

Cubatus.text: Have been expecting to hear from you. Are you well

Cucuma.text: Have been expecting to hear from you. Very anxious

Cultor.text: Do your utmost to avoid unnecessary expense
